alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Koochiching and northern St. Louis Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Buyck, to near Orr, to near Pelican Lake, to 6 miles south of Nett Lake, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Buyck around 630 PM CDT. Lake Vermilion around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Trout Lake, Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area, Greaney and Big Moose Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
